solution_line_template: First find the total number of spools of yarn James has: {red_yarn_spools} spools + {black_yarn_spools} spools + {blue_yarn_spools} spools = <<{red_yarn_spools}+{black_yarn_spools}+{blue_yarn_spools}={total_spools}>>{total_spools} spools
Then divide that number by the number spools each beret needs: {total_spools} spools / {spools_per_beret} spools/beret = <<{total_spools}/{spools_per_beret}={total_berets}>>{total_berets} berets
